com.revivedstandards.main

Class StandardAudio

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revivedstandards.main.StandardAudio

  • public class StandardAudio
extends java.lang.Object
    StandardAudio controls all audio effects for the API. For music purposes, the Javax api should be used. For sound effects, the JavaFX API should be used.
